goal.ch: To let the students be familiar with the advanced knowledge of ordinary differential equations and their applications
goal.en: To let the students be familiar with the advanced knowledge of ordinary differential equations and their applications

outline.ch:
Contents:
4.Nonlinear Systems of ODEs.
(a)Stability of Equilibria
(b)Stable Manifold Theorem (for Hyperbolic Systems)
(c)Center Manifold Theorem (for Non-hyperbolic Systems)*
5.Some Knowledge from Dynamical Systems
(a)Lyapunov Theory for the Stability of General Systems
(b)Limit Cycles; Poincare Maps
(c)Poincare-Bendixson Theorem (for 2 by 2 systems)
6.Boundary Value Problems of ODEs.
(a)Homogeneous BVPs
(b)Green Functions
(c)Existence and Uniqueness of Solutions to General BVPs
7.Perturbation Methods to Ordinary Differential Equations
(a)Some Technique in Perturbation Theory; ODEs with Small Parameters
(b)Singluar Perturbations in Ordinary Differential Equations
(c)Geometric Singular Perturbations to ODEs*
Note:
The sub-section marked with “*” means it will be taught if we have free time. The lecture note will still be provided.
